The photo was not taken in California: The expert's investigation revealed that the photo was taken over the big island of Hawaii, not California.
Confirmation from the photo: s author: The author of the photo, Nathan Province, confirmed that it was taken in Hawaii and not in California.
Previous instances of the photo being sh: The expert found that the same photo had been shared in 2018 during wildfires, indicating a history of it being used inaccurately.
Explanation from an atmospheric scientis: An atmospheric scientist explained that the red glow in the photo was caused by a sun angle below the horizontal plane illuminating shallow altocumulus clouds, further supporting that it was not depicting California wildfires.
